title: OCE server skin.
body:
After seeing the announcement that we will have to pay for our server skin, unlike any other server with their respective server skins, I have decided to take action. I have started a petition, located on [Change.org](https://www.change.org/p/riot-games-riot-let-us-have-the-oce-skin-for-free?recruiter=394058478&utm_source=share_for_starters&utm_medium=copyLink), and fired off a support ticket to Riot in the hopes that the issue might be discussed.

The fact remains that no one from Riot ever stated that the Pool Party Ziggs skin given out during the beta was a "replacement" for the OCE skin, and that, if we wanted to have the skin that is to represent our server, we would **have** to spend money on Riot Points to purchase it from the in-client store. Help me fight this discrimination against the OCE server and add numbers to the petition.

replies.body:
The answer to this question is simple. Yes, we should. As someone suggested somewhere else, if charity wasn't added purely to placate and manipulate us, what they should have done is made it free for OCE and then had a percentage of worldwide purchases go to charity. Instead, we just get fucked. Par for the course for OCE to be honest. Of all the companies screwing us over, I had truly hoped Riot wouldn't be one of them. I thought after the backlash on the Karma rework that Riot would have learned to "Announce changes sooner" and to "learn from this moving forward". But those are all just words to distract stupid people from the obvious truth that they're just straight up ripping us off.

Already signed the petition btw. I doubt it will change anything but who knows.

Good to have your support. Thing is, I've not seen anything else that could change Riot's mind so this petition is probably our best bet for change, and it will only help if enough people know about it. I've tried to spread the word myself but it seems it's a job for more than just one person and I'm not trying to convince other to help me spread it among the community, but haven't seen any evidence of this happening yet. 

As I've stated in the update, Riot seems to be ignoring my attempts of discussion on the issue, which doesn't bode well for them. I'm going to keep trying, and attempt different methods as well, so that this cause can get the attention it deserves. If all goes well with this it may just prove to Riot that they need to listen to the community more.
Well i wouldn't mind paying for decent skin and besides guys the money is going to charity. It's all going towards a good cause!

Except it's not a decent skin, it's just something Riot threw together and put a "southern star" in the background of because f*ck OCE. There were plenty of good ideas from the community, including a Cockatoo themed skin, but instead Riot gives us this barely passable "server skin".

Thing is though, they could do any number of things to raise money for charity. They could have a skin/champion sale, make a skin for the sole purpose of raising money for charity or any number of things, but instead they exploit the OCE server by using our server skin to raise that money.

i dont think they ever stated the skin would be free, at least i cant find a source on it, but they most definitely made it appear that way. Russia got like 3 skins for free, including their region one, and we only get pp ziggs l0l

True, they never explicitly stated that the OCE skin would be free *however* they also never said that PP Ziggs was the only free skin they would give out for the OCE server, until today's announcement. They most definitely made it appear they would be giving the server skin for free, I agree on that. Honestly, I'm starting to think they only recently made this decision and are trying to play it off as a "long term plan" for the OCE skin.
In Soviet Russia, skins, given to you.
I'd care more, but Riot is donating the profits from the skin to charity which is very decent of them. In addition we get half off which is very nice.
And that's exactly how they want you to think, so you'll forgive them for exploiting our server skin. If they didn't care what people thought about it they wouldn't be donating that money.

How are they exploiting it when they probably won't make enough money off it to justify using time and money to make the skin, when they could've made a skin that would actually make them money?

There's any number of ways for Riot to raise money for charity, instead they're using charity as an excuse to make people pay for our server's skin when they otherwise wouldn't have to. If they truly cared about OCE they'd treat our server's skin like any other server's skin and just give it to the people who deserve it for free.

This decision of their's has made me think they see us only as a bunch of randoms on the other side of the world that they can exploit.

They specifically stated we already got a free skin. That on it's own was iffy, but I think combined with the charity thing is acceptable. We can just agree to disagree though.

The charity thing sounds fine to me if it weren't for being a server skin, which Russia got 3 free ones of. And the charity part only applies for the duration of the sale, so it'll be making them money like a normal skin after. I don't play Kass, but this seems kinda unfair to OCE players compared to other servers.

> They specifically stated we already got a free skin.

This is their excuse to try and con us into buying the server skin. Riot has had over 2 years to tell us our server skin wouldn't be free, if anything they should have at least responded to one of the dozens of threads discussing a "free server skin", yet they never did. Why is that? Why did they neglect to inform us? Likely because that wasn't part of their plan at the time.

> but I think combined with the charity thing is acceptable.

And this is exactly the response they were hoping for. If they can get people to ignore the obvious exploitation of our server skin just by promising to donate some of the profits to charity it effectively gets them off the hook. As I've said, there are any number of ways they could raise money for charity without exploiting the OCE server, but they're not.

Getting a 1350RP skin half price on release is a good deal. Not as good as free, but still really good. I don't know why other servers were allowed to get their skins for free though and they had to change the rules for us.

The rules we're changed for us because as a bonus for joining and testing out the new laggy as fuck OCE server, we received Pool Party Ziggs for free.. May I add there was no disclaimer stating this would impact the server skin at all. Everyone was still under the impression that, like absolutely every other server, we'd get a skin that A) accurately represented our region and B) was free. Instead we get this mockery of a skin for a champion that I hardly see played, and it will cost us. Again, I've stated multiple times on various other threads that while it's a nice gesture that a percentage of proceeds will be going to charity, I'd rather pay full price and have it all go to charity, instead of a money-hungry company that continuously fucks you over.
I've updated the petition with news of recent attempts to discuss the issue with Riot.
